No, I was talking about the Element, Mantle's ship.

::Prowl::

Prowl nods toward Mantle. "Epyon, meet Mantle. Mantle, Epyon. Mantle
is the commander of that ship back there. He wants to discuss the city
with us."



--- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> OOC: A similar post may appear.
> 
> ::Epyon::
> 
> "Be right over," Epyon replyed. He found Prowl and walked over.
> "What is it?"
